text: Ani unako samudayaka saradaraharule jo kaphira thi'e ra akhiratako agamanala'i jhutha thandathe ra jasala'i hamile sansarika jivanama sukha pradana gareka thiyaum, tiniharule javapha dina thaleh ki yo ta timi jastai e'uta manisa ho. Juna kisimale khana timile khanchau, tyastai prakarako khana yasale pani khancha, ra juna pani timi pi'umdachau, tyastai yasale pani pi'umcha
